Reading Guide

For Beginners

Start with these chapters to get up and running:

  1. Chapter 1: Introduction to MCP and the MCP-Client-CLI
  2. Chapter 3: Setting Up the MCP-Client-CLI
  3. Chapter 4: Basic Usage and Commands

For Advanced Users

Jump to these chapters for advanced topics:

  • Chapter 6: Advanced Testing Capabilities
  • Chapter 7: AI-Driven Configuration System
  • Chapter 8: CI/CD Integration

For Troubleshooting

When you encounter issues:

  • Chapter 10: Troubleshooting and Best Practices
  • Chapter 11: Case Studies and Real-World Examples
